title: Wild Card Weekend Picks with Prisco, Kostos, RJ (Football 1/04)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco, Nick Kostos and R.J. White to break down Wild Card Weekend. The guys are giving themselves a big budget for the playoffs -- $1000 in fake cash -- and whoever comes out with the most wins. They explain the game (5:00) and then look at the games coming up this weekend, including the Colts-Texans (6:00), Seahawks-Cowboys (16:00), Chargers-Ravens (24:15), Eagles-Bears (33:15) and their exotic/future bets (45:30).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
